input: Can you find out the average amount of transactions for all valid prenote entries associated with the bank account that has the UUID 01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef?

output.sql: SELECT AVG(TransactionCurrencyAmount) FROM BankAccountPrenoteEntry WHERE BankAccountUUID = '01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef' AND ValidIndicator = TRUE;
